Changes.LogName: Add animations for Emily's son as firstborn.
Fill firstborn's empty schedule dialogue with that of Elliott's son.

Entries.Mon.000: {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }} lived in this house on the beach before... It looks like a good place to live.$5#$e#I want to live close to the ocean when I grow up, too.$5
Entries.Sat.000: I'm watching Mister Willy fish today.
Entries.SquidFest.000: Catching a squid sounds hard. Um, good luck, {{Random: {{FarmerRefFirstborn}} }}.$5
Entries.TroutDerby.000: Why do the fish have tags? Did they eat them?$7#$b#That doesn't sound good.$6
Entries.DesertFestival.000: {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }} said I can take off my shoes to feel the sand on my feet.#$b#It's really hot! The sand at home isn't this hot!$3
Entries.Schoolhouse.001: The river's so nice. I want to watch it forever...$5#$b#Huh? I'm late to class? Oops!$3
Entries.Schoolhouse.002: It's raining today, so I'm reading inside.

Changes.LogName: Fill firstborn's empty dialogue with that of Elliott's son.

Entries.AcceptBirthdayGift_Negative: Oh... is this for my birthday? I don't want it...$2
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)StardropTea: Is this tea? Oh... it's a yummy tea?$7#$b#Mmm! This is sweet. It's really good!$1
Entries.AcceptGift_fish_crab_pot: Did you catch this with a crab pot? It's so cute.$5
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)717: A crab! It's pokey and pointy. I wonder if it's faster than this other one...$5
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)710: A crab pot! Thank you! I'll use it to catch crabs and other things.$1
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)Book_Crabbing: Oh! I like this book! It's about crabs!$1
Entries.AcceptGift_category_fish: Did you catch this fish? Wow...$3#$b#I'll go show it to Mister Willy.$5
Entries.AcceptGift_coffee_item: Oh, it's coffee!$1#$b#I'm not allowed to drink it, but it has a good smell. It smells like morning.$5
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)197: Eugh. I don't like cheese. It smells really terrible.$2
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)206: Eugh. I don't like cheese. It smells really terrible.$2
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)215: Eugh. I don't like cheese. It smells really terrible.$2
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)424: Eugh. I don't like cheese. It smells really terrible.$2
Entries.AcceptGift_(O)426: Eugh. I don't like cheese. It smells really terrible.$2
Entries.AcceptGift_cheese_item: Eugh. I don't like cheese. It smells really terrible.$2
Entries.AcceptGift_alcohol_item: This smells weird... is it safe?$6
Entries.Resort_Entering: I want to see the island fish!$1
Entries.Resort_Leaving: All, um... all good things come to an end... But I wanted to play more.$2
Entries.Resort: I met a crab. It ran away like the wind.#$b#Now I'm looking for island fish. There's a blue one I want to see.$5
Entries.GreenRain: The rain's green!$3#$b#If a lot of green rain falls, will the ocean turn green too?$4
Entries.Mon: I like going to the beach with {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }}. We look for shells and watch the ocean together.$1
Entries.Tue: Crabs come in so many colours. My favourite is orange.$1#$e#I wonder how many different crab colours there are? I bet there's a million.$0
Entries.Thu: I read a library book about fishing.#$b#Fishing is cool, but it looks difficult.$4
Entries.Fri: Shrimp are so silly. They have so many legs!$1#$e#When I hold them, they curl up. It's so cute.$5
Entries.Sat: Mister Willy knows the best places for fishing.$5#$b#Sometimes he shows me how to set up a good crab pot.$0
Entries.Sun: I want to catch a fish with my hands, but they're scared of me.$4#$e#A fish must think I'm really big. But to an adult, I'm small.$0#$b#It's, um, a matter of per...perception. That's what {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }} says.$7
Entries.summer_Mon: Sometimes {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }} brings crabs home from the beach on accident.$1#$e#I wish we could keep them, but the beach is their home.$0
Entries.summer_Tue: The ocean smells good. It's lovely.$5#$b#But cheese smells weird.$4#$e#Garlic smells the worst. Yuck.$6#$e#Some people don't like the smell of the ocean. {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }} told me. Why?$6
Entries.summer_Wed: Are crabs friends or food...?$4#$b#{{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }} eats crabs. I eat them sometimes too. Actually, {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }} makes food with a lot of different fish.$4#$b#It makes me think a lot. I'm pondering. Crabs and fish are fun to look at and play with. Should I eat them?$6#$e#This is hard. Maybe I'll think more about it when I'm a grown-up.$4
Entries.summer_Thu: I wonder if I'll write a book when I'm older? Like {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }}.#$b#Maybe it'd be fun!$1#$e#I want to write a story with crabs in it.$5
Entries.summer_Fri: Summer's great for looking for crabs on the beach. I can find lots of little ones that are easy to pick up.$5#$e#Do all the little crabs grow up into big crabs?
Entries.summer_Sat: I showed Mister Willy a crab I caught. He said she looked big and sprightly.$1#$e#How does Mister Willy know which crabs are girls? They all look the same to me.$7#$e#Wait... Mister Willy calls all the crabs girls!$3#$b#But aren't some of them boys like me? I don't get it.$6
Entries.summer_Sun: I don't want summer to ever end. But... I guess it has to end when it's over.$7#$e#I'll, um, make the most of my summer.$7
Entries.fall_Mon: The beach in fall has sand and leaves and shells...#$b#What happens to the leaves on the beach when fall's over? Where do they go?$4#$e#I asked {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }} and {{lowercase:{{Random: {{CoSub1}} }} }} said that it'd be a good story idea... {{lowercase:{{Random: {{CoSub1}} }} }} didn't answer my question.$7
Entries.fall_Tue: Crab pots catch different things when you put them in different places. It's because different things live in salty water and fresh water.#$e#Mister Willy says you shouldn't put a crab pot in the mines.$7#$b#He said they get washed away... and sometimes, they get eaten by something.$3#$b#Is that really true?$4
Entries.fall_Wed: Maybe I'll try to catch a snail in a crab pot.#$e#Why is it called a crab pot if it catches things that aren't crabs?$7
Entries.fall_Thu: Visiting the library is nice. I like reading different books.#$b#But... what happens when I read all the books in the library? Does that mean there's no more books to read...?$2#$e#Mister Gunther says he can buy more books if I run out of new books to read. So... I shouldn't be sad.$4#$b#But where do the books come from? Who writes them?$7
Entries.fall_Fri: I found a spider. I'm keeping it in my jacket.$0#$b#It's very charming. It waves its legs around when I hold it.$1#$e#Don't worry, I'll let it go free! Just after we play together for a while...$5
Entries.fall_Sat: Mister Willy showed me a pearl. He said I can have it if I take care of lots of crabs.#$e#Did Mister Willy give you a pearl before, {{Random: {{FarmerRefFirstborn}} }}?
Entries.fall_Sun: {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }} almost killed the plant at home today. {{Random: {{CoSub1}} }} tried to use the adult drink to water it.$4#$b#I told {{lowercase:{{Random: {{CoObj1}} }} }} the water smelled weird and {{lowercase:{{Random: {{CoSub1}} }} }} stopped before watering it. I'm glad I saved the plant.$5
Entries.winter_Mon: Sometimes {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }} teaches me piano. It's cool, but I like fish more.
Entries.winter_Tue: I wish winter wasn't so cold. I can't see the crabs on the beach anymore.$6
Entries.winter_Wed: {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }} said I learned to talk really quick. Am I smart?$7#$e#I'm really good at reading, too. I think I'm smart.$1
Entries.winter_Thu: Do you like books, {{Random: {{FarmerRefFirstborn}} }}? I think reading books is fun.$5#$e#Sometimes book authors use different words for the same things.$4#$b#I saw a book that made a cat go "miaow" and a different one where the cat said "meow".$7#$b#Do cats say different things like that, or is it the writing person making them say different things?$7
Entries.winter_Fri: There's lots of smelly stuff in Mister Willy's store. But I don't hate it.#$e#It smells like worms and bait and fish.
Entries.winter_Sat: Mister Willy fishes in the snow, too.$7#$b#But it's so cold out. It's freezing!$3#$e#Why don't fish freeze in the water? The water's so, so cold...$7
Entries.winter_Sun: There's nautilus shells on the beach in winter.#$e#Nautilus... naut-il-lus.. It's hard to say.$4

Changes.LogName: Fill firstborn's empty dialogue with that of Elliott's son (singular pronouns).

Entries.Wed: {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }} always reads me a bedtime story to sleep. {{Random: {{CoSub1}} }} says my vo-ca-bul-dary's very good because of it.#$e#A voca-buldary is the words that you know. That means I know a lot of words.$5

Entries.Wed: {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }} always reads me a bedtime story to sleep. {{Random: {{CoSub1}} }} say my vo-ca-bul-dary's very good because of it.#$e#A voca-buldary is the words that you know. That means I know a lot of words.$5

Changes.LogName: Add rain dialogue for Elliott's son as firstborn.

Entries.{{FirstbornName}}: Mister Willy says that fish like rain.#$b#How do fish know when it's raining? Can they feel it through the water?$7

Changes.LogName: Add Emily's son to Egg Festival as firstborn.
Add Egg Festival dialogue for Elliott's son as firstborn.

Entries.{{FirstbornName}}: Eggs are yummy. Why do chickens lay them?
Entries.{{FirstbornName}}_y2: Do you think hunting for eggs is like catching fish?#$e#Eggs don't swim, so I guess it's not the same.$7

Changes.LogName: Add Emily's son to Flower Dance as firstborn.
Add Flower Dance dialogue for Elliott's son as firstborn.

Entries.{{FirstbornName}}: There's little fish in the water here. Hi little fish!$5
Entries.{{FirstbornName}}_y2: {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }} said Auntie Leah's going to teach me to dance. But dancing seems hard...$4

Changes.LogName: Add Emily's son to Luau as firstborn.
Add Luau dialogue for Elliott's son as firstborn.

Entries.{{FirstbornName}}: Yay! We're on the beach today.$1#$e#I wonder what food I'll eat. I don't want anything smelly.$7
Entries.{{FirstbornName}}_y2: Crab cakes! Yummy...$1#$e#I hope the crabs had a long and happy life before they were cooked into food.$0

Changes.LogName: Add Emily's son to Moonlight Jellies as firstborn.
Add Moonlight Jellies dialogue for Elliott's son as firstborn.

Entries.{{FirstbornName}}: I hope the jellies don't die out. They're so nice.$4
Entries.{{FirstbornName}}_y2: Summer's ending... It's sad. But I'll say goodbye to summer.$2

Changes.LogName: Add Emily's son to Fair as firstborn.
Add Fair dialogue for Elliott's son as firstborn (singular pronouns).

Entries.{{FirstbornName}}: I like these mussels. They're really cute. They're adorable.$5
Entries.{{FirstbornName}}_y2: {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }} said {{lowercase:{{Random: {{CoSub1}} }} }}'s going to purchase a hat for me. {{Random: {{CoSub1}} }} said it's going to make me look dapper.

Entries.{{FirstbornName}}: I like these mussels. They're really cute. They're adorable.$5
Entries.{{FirstbornName}}_y2: {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }} said {{lowercase:{{Random: {{CoSub1}} }} }}'re going to purchase a hat for me. {{Random: {{CoSub1}} }} said it's going to make me look dapper.

Changes.LogName: Add Emily's son to Spirit's Eve as firstborn.
Add Spirit's Eve dialogue for Elliott's son as firstborn.

Entries.{{FirstbornName}}: I want more pie. Can you cut a slice for me, {{Random: {{FarmerRefFirstborn}} }}?
Entries.{{FirstbornName}}_y2: The monsters won't escape, right? {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }}'s just saying funny things...$4

Changes.LogName: Add Emily's son to Festival of Ice as firstborn.
Add Festival of Ice dialogue for Elliott's son as firstborn.

Entries.{{FirstbornName}}: Who do I cheer for in the ice fishing competition? Hmm... This is hard.$6
Entries.{{FirstbornName}}_y2: I want to enter the ice fishing competition too! But maybe after I get better at fishing.$5

Add Winter Star dialogue for Elliott's son as firstborn (singular pronouns).

Entries.{{FirstbornName}}: The Feast of the Winter Star smells like mint and pine.#$b#And lots of yummy food, too!$1
Entries.{{FirstbornName}}_y2: Auntie Leah says {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }} drank too much. Does that mean {{lowercase:{{Random: {{CoSub1}} }} }} needs to go to the washroom?$7

Changes.LogName: Add movie concession tastes for Emily's son as firstborn.
Add movie reactions for Emily's son as firstborn.

BeforeMovie.Text: {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }}'s here to watch the movie with us!$1

AfterMovie.Text: That was awesome. I like watching movies together.$5

BeforeMovie.Text: I like the story in this movie! The end is so cute.$1

AfterMovie.Text: The sapling grew into a tree! I want to grow up like the sapling.$5

BeforeMovie.Text: I know this movie! It's great.$1

AfterMovie.Text: That was so much fun. It was awesome.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: Do you think {{Random: {{CompanionRefFirstborn}} }} would like this movie?
What's this movie? It looks weird.$7

Entries.Desk.18: {{FirstbornDisplayName}}'s desk. The drawing has a doodle of a crab on the other side.

Changes.LogName: Edit schedule dialogue for Elliott's son as firstborn to use genericized versions.

Entries.Mon.000: This house on the beach looks like a good place to live...$5#$e#I want to live close to the ocean when I grow up, too.$5
Entries.Sat.000: I'm trying to learn to fish today.
Entries.DesertFestival.000: I'm taking off my shoes to feel the sand on my feet.#$b#It's really hot! The sand at home isn't this hot!$3

Changes.LogName: Edit dialogue for Elliott's son as firstborn to use genericized versions.

Entries.AcceptGift_category_fish: Did you catch this fish? Wow...$3#$b#That's so cool. I wanna catch a fish like this one day.$5
Entries.Mon: I like going to the beach. My favourite things are looking for shells and watching the ocean waves.$1
Entries.Wed: Someone said my vo-ca-bul-dary's very good because I read all the time.#$e#A voca-buldary is the words that you know. That means I know a lot of words.$5
Entries.Sat: I want to set up a good crab pot. Is there a secret way to do it well?
Entries.Sun: I want to catch a fish with my hands, but they're scared of me.$4#$e#A fish must think I'm really big. But to an adult, I'm small.$0#$b#It's, um, a matter of per...perception.$7
Entries.summer_Mon: Sometimes I bring crabs home from the beach on accident.$1#$e#I wish we could keep them, but I know the beach is their home.$0
Entries.summer_Tue: The ocean smells good. It's lovely.$5#$b#But cheese smells weird.$4#$e#Garlic smells the worst. Yuck.$6#$e#Some people don't like the smell of the ocean. Why?$6
Entries.summer_Wed: Are crabs friends or food...?$4#$b#I eat crabs sometimes. Actually, I eat a lot of different fish.$4#$b#It makes me think a lot. I'm pondering. Crabs and fish are fun to look at and play with. Should I eat them?$6#$e#This is hard. Maybe I'll think more about it when I'm a grown-up.$4
Entries.summer_Thu: I wonder if I'll write a book when I'm older? Books are fun to read.#$b#Maybe it'd be fun to write!$1#$e#I want to write a story with crabs in it.$5
Entries.summer_Sat: Is there a difference between boy crabs and girl crabs? Because baby crabs come from, um...$6#$e#Um... anyway, how do boy crabs know which crabs are girl crabs? Do they know?$7
Entries.fall_Mon: The beach in fall has sand and leaves and shells...#$b#What happens to the leaves on the beach when fall's over? Where do they go?$4
Entries.fall_Tue: Crab pots catch different things when you put them in different places. It's because different things live in salty water and fresh water.#$e#I heard you shouldn't put a crab pot in the mines.$7#$b#They get washed away... and sometimes, they get eaten by something.$3#$b#Is that really true?$4
Entries.fall_Thu: Visiting the library is nice. I like reading different books.#$b#But... what happens when I read all the books in the library? Does that mean there's no more books to read...?$2#$e#I guess... the library has new books sometimes, so I don't have to worry about reading everything.$4#$b#But where do the new books come from? Who writes them?$7
Entries.fall_Sat: I saw a pearl today. It was so shiny...#$e#Have you ever found a pearl, {{Random: {{FarmerRefFirstborn}} }}?
Entries.fall_Sun: Why is there a drink that kids can't drink?$4#$b#It smells gross... so I don't know why adults like it.$7
Entries.winter_Mon: Sometimes I read books that aren't about fish. They're cool, but I like fish more.
Entries.winter_Fri: There's lots of smelly stuff at the fish store. But I don't hate it.#$e#It smells like worms and bait and fish.
Entries.winter_Sat: It's possible to fish in the winter.$7#$b#But it's so cold out. It's freezing!$3#$e#Why don't fish freeze in the water? The water's so, so cold...$7

Changes.LogName: Edit rain dialogue for Elliott's son as firstborn to use genericized version.

Entries.{{FirstbornName}}: I heard that some fish like rain.#$b#How do fish know when it's raining? Can they feel it through the water?$7

Changes.LogName: Edit dialogue for Elliott's son as firstborn to use single parenting versions.

Entries.winter_Wed: I learned to talk really quick, right? Am I smart?$7#$e#I'm really good at reading, too. I think I'm smart.$1

Changes.LogName: Edit Flower Dance dialogue for Elliott's son as firstborn to use genericized versions.

Entries.{{FirstbornName}}_y2: I'm trying to learn to dance by watching, but it seems hard...$4

Changes.LogName: Edit Fair dialogue for Elliott's son as firstborn to use genericized versions.

Entries.{{FirstbornName}}_y2: I want to buy a hat from the stand, and I want to do it by myself.#$e#Maybe one year, I'll be good enough to fish for enough tokens.$5

Changes.LogName: Edit Spirit's Eve dialogue for Elliott's son as firstborn to use genericized versions.

Entries.{{FirstbornName}}_y2: The monsters won't escape, right? I'm just a little scared...$4

Changes.LogName: Edit Winter Star dialogue for Elliott's son as firstborn to use genericized versions.

Entries.{{FirstbornName}}_y2: I'm drinking apple cider. The one I have is good for kids to drink, and it smells really delicious.

Changes.LogName: Add dialogue for liked movies for Elliott's son as firstborn.
